0: World's oldest person, Arkansan Gertrude Weaver, dies Posted: Monday, April 6, 2015 3:09 PM EDT Updated: Monday, April 13, 2015 2:53 PM EDT NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Channel 7 News has confirmed that the world's oldest person, 116-year-old Gertrude Weaver from Arkansas, died Monday morning. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Ms. Weaver died due to complications from pneumonia. She passed away peacefully at 10:12 Monday morning, according to the staff at Silver Oaks Health and Rehabilitation Center in Camden where she was a resident. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Gertrude Weaver, born in 1898, was already the oldest person in America, but she was pronounced the world's oldest
